transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Mr. Manish Gandhi ji baat kar rahe the Vibhu Tiles se?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, Vijay Agrawal baat kar raha hu senior manager IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ye abhi aapke ye jo representative hai Tannu unse aapki baat ho rahi thi sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapke paas whatsapp pe ek option aaya tha aapke paas feedback dene ke liye sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To waha pe aapne not satisfied kiya sir aapne.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To uske reason ko janne ke liye maine aapko call kiya tha ki sir kya issue aa raha hai sir kya mere ko ek cheez bataiye ye aap log service free mein dete ho?
Executive: Free mein kya dete hain?
Customer: Ye jo service aap dete ho to humko free mein dete ho?
Executive: Service nahi wo payment paid hota hai sir.
Customer: Payment hota hai na payment hum karte hain na.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul.
Customer: Abhi under the given circumstances aap log waha pe ye jo relationship manager hai har do teen mahine mein badli hota hai ya che mahine mein badli hota hai maximum.
Customer: Abhi har baar jo aata hai naya wo aadha aadha ghanta paka deta hai yaar.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Jaisa main I will just give you a small example.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Maine ek mera preliminary requirement hai ke matlab mera product ka feasibility is within 200 kilometers of my factory.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Abhi har baar naya banda ko har do teen mahine mein ye explain karna mumkin nahi hai.
Customer: Same cheeze baar baar repeat karna naye naye bande ko same cheez baar baar repeat aaj ek behuda question aisa aata hai jaise ke agar samjho mera ek grauz hai mera lead conversion nahi ho raha hai to lead conversion kyun nahi ho raha hai wo mujhse puch rahe are mere ko malum hota to main lead convert hi karwa leta na.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Lead customer ko apne seha puch sakte hai ke potential customer ko ke bhai aap humse kyun nahi le rahe ho.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Ye you need to train this guys properly homever you are talking to I can understand ke mera product ka technical knowledge nahi hota they handle variety of products and all that stuff but these basic things to matlab and the thing is even if they don't understand the product they try to preach to me.
Customer: Ye karo wo karo sometimes I fail to understand in spite of having paid so much of amount of money then why should I answer all these questions.
Customer: Useless questions.
Customer: Ye inka akela ka nahi hai I have a grauz against all almost all relationship manager jab se mera relationship chalu hua na tab se ek aadha mushkil se koi dhang ka mila hai mere ko.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: I think you should seriously have a relook at this procedure of getting feedback from your customer.
Executive: Main aapki baat ko understand kar raha hu ki aapko baar baar account manager jo change ho rahe hain usse thoda sa problem reh raha hai sir.
Customer: Usme bhi problem ho raha hai baar baar same cheez explain karna padta hai har banda ko aur dusra kya hai ke I am your customer.
Executive: Ji ji sir.
Customer: Abhi why I am very frankly bolta hu only reason why I am still with IndiaMART is because I want to have an online presence. Baki it is not value for money for me matlab in terms of conversion and on this thing wo kuch mera aana jana nahi hai lekin wo 30 35 40 hazar saal ka main de raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To matlab mere ko hi paka ho gaya kya.
Executive: Sahi baat hai bilkul thik baat hai.
Customer: Matlab aisa literally at the end of every conversation whenever usually to main abhi to do char das baar kaat ta hu pehle line unka fir main baat karta hu kabhi free baitha tha lekin at the end of every conversation after 15 minutes of talking I am literally mera sar pakad ke baithna padta hai ke yaar kaiko dimag pakaya maine.
Executive: Nahi aisi koi baat nahi hai sir main apni team ko mana kar dunga ki aapko multiple times jo hai wo call na kare sir right.
Customer: Nahi aur jo bhi call karne ka baat nahi hai call aap kitni baar bhi karo usme koi dikkat nahi hai lekin ek same ka same cheez agar teen mahina pehle maine kisi ko bola teen mahina uska ek mahina baad mein badli ho gaya to wapas dusra koi aayega wo bhi wahi puchega.
Executive: Main samajh gaya aapki baat ko jo aap kehna cha rahe hain.
Executive: To matlab aap ek kaam kijiye sir one person contact rakhiye aap koi dikkat nahi hai aapko koi bhi rehta hai aap mera number save kar lijiye sir main jo aapke account manager hai lekin manager unka manager baat kar raha hu sir to koi bhi issue rehta hai koi bhi rehta hai aapko problem to aap sirf one of point contact rakhiye mere se rakhiye aap sir aap ye number aap save kar sakte hain.
Customer: Mere ko problem nahi hai main jaisa aapko bola na ke mere paas ye only to have an online presence that I am enrolled in this thing IndiaMART to maine aaj tak mere ko koi problem aaya hai nahi aayega to main aapka sampark karunga lekin ye to aap log ke taraf se jo samne se call aata hai na feedback ke liye usme dikkat hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: I think course ka quality aapko sudharna padega interaction between the relationship manager and the customer ultimately your customers are paying you money for this.
Executive: Great sir.
Customer: Agar koi free mein service deta hai aur apne ko 10 baar bhi paka ek ghanta bhi pakaega to parwat kya hai wo bhai pocket mein de raha hai thik hai ji ji ji ye to paisa dene ke baad mein aisa sar pakad ke baithna pade wo to galat hai.
Executive: Correct baat hai sahi baat hai.
Customer: Aap mere jagah pe aur koi line mein bhi aur koi field mein bhi agar koi paisa de raha hai customer aur aap usko insincerely hammer karte ho to koi matlab nahi banta kuch matlab last year to mere ko ek baar aisa hua tha frustrate mere ko laga ke abhi ye band hi kar do.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: It can happen also because risk to reward to hai nahi usme rewards to kuch hai nahi mushkil se jo paisa bhara hai utna bhi mushkil se nikalta hai do saal lekin ye chakkar ho jata hai jaise dekh lijiye kuch hota hai to thik hai nahi hota to jane dijiye kya kare.
Executive: Ji aisi koi baat nahi sir koi agar aap koi problem face kar rahe ho to aap mere ko directly bata sakte hain main yaha pe aapki help ke liye baitha hu.
Customer: Haan main bataunga aapko agar mere ko problem hoga kuch to.
Executive: Thik hai sir baki main ek baar Tannu ko bolta hu ki matlab multiple times call na kare thik hai aur jo bhi kaam ki baat hai sir wahi baat kare idhar udhar ki baatein na kare sir right.
Customer: Agar kuch aapko input dena hai to baat alag hai baki agar customer ko kyun nahi kharidta mere ko uska aisa sawal ka mere paas jawab nahi aata.
Executive: Correct hai sir nahi main thoda sa samjhata hu ki matlab ki multiple asking question na kare sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Relationship manager changes frequently.

- Same information has to be repeated.

- Asks irrelevant questions.

- Wants to have an online presence.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.

- Executive shared his contact number.

- Executive will instruct the team to avoid multiple calls.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- relationship manager, feedback, multiple calls, online presence
